title: Google Maps Scraper
description: Provide either a list of search keywords or search/place URLs.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of URLs with search results, that should be scraped.

searchStringsArray.title: Search Terms
searchStringsArray.description: Array of strings, that will be searched on Google maps. 'Pubs near Prague'. If you are setting specific location later, do not include it into search string

maxCrawledPlaces.title: Max crawled places
maxCrawledPlaces.description: Use to limit places you want to get from crawl one search. If you fill 0 or nothing all places will be scrape

forceEng.title: Force English
forceEng.description: Force place data to be displayed in English

maxReviews.title: Max reviews (Slow)
maxReviews.description: Max number of reviews per place to scrape. If you fill 0 or nothing, no reviews will be scraped. For all reviews, just put 99999
maxReviews.sectionDescription: You can set what extra information you would like extracted.

maxImages.title: Max Images (Very slow)
maxImages.description: Max number of images per place to scrape. If you fill 0 or nothing, no images will be scraped. For all images, just put 99999

includeHistogram.title: Include popular times
includeHistogram.description: If checked the crawler scrapes popular times for all places. You can speed up crawling if you disable this.

includeOpeningHours.title: Include opening hours
includeOpeningHours.description: If checked the crawler scrapes opening hours for all places. You can speed up crawling if you disable this.

includePeopleAlsoSearch.title: Include people also search
includePeopleAlsoSearch.description: If checked the crawler scrape "people also search" for all places. You can speed up crawling if you disable this.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Place Info
additionalInfo.description: Export additional info: Service Options, Highlights, Offerings,...

exportPlaceUrls.title: Export Place Urls Only (Skips place details)
exportPlaceUrls.description: Scraper will return only places URLs without details.

country.title: Country
country.description: Set a country where the search should be performed - e.g. 'USA'. For more accurate search, set lat and lng.
country.sectionDescription: Here you can set where the places should be searched. Either use country (and optionally state or city) or latitude and longitude for more accuracy. Using lat/long + zoom is generally much faster because the scraper doesn't traverse the whole country/state/city.

state.title: State
state.description: Set a state where the search should be performed - e.g. 'Massachusetts'. For more accurate search, set lat and lng.

city.title: City
city.description: Set a city where the search should be performed - e.g. 'Pittsfield .For more accurate search, set lat and lng.

lat.title: Viewport point latitude
lat.description: Use it with combination with longitude and zoom to set up viewport to search on. Has preference over country/state/city.

lng.title: Viewport point longitude
lng.description: Use it with combination with latitude and zoom to set up viewport to search on. Has preference over country/state/city.

zoom.title: Viewport zoom level
zoom.description: Use it with combination with point longitude and latitude to set up viewport to search on. The higher number, the close you are to the point. You have the whole world on the map with zoom level 1.

maxAutomaticZoomOut.title: Max automatic zoom out
maxAutomaticZoomOut.description: Parameter to stop searching once Google zooms out too far. It counts how far it zoomed out compared to the first page. Keep in mind that `zoom: 1` is the whole world and `zoom: 21` is a tiny street. So usually you want `maxAutomaticZoomOut` to be between `0` and `5`. Also, keep in mind that Google zooms a bit differently in each run.

proxyConfig.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfig.description: Choose your proxy, you need to use Apify proxy or custom proxies.
proxyConfig.sectionDescription: How the browsers will behave during the scraping process.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages that will be processed in parallel.

maxPageRetries.title: Max page retries
maxPageRetries.description: Maximum number of retries when page scraping fails.

pageLoadTimeoutSec.title: Page load timeout seconds
pageLoadTimeoutSec.description: Max time that the page can be loading

maxPagesPerBrowser.title: Max opened pages per browser
maxPagesPerBrowser.description: How many pages can be opened at once for each browser. Having more pages in one browser is faster but can lead to increased blocking.

useChrome.title: Use Chrome
useChrome.description: Uses full Chrome browser instead of Chromium. Be careful, it is not stable on some versions!

debug.title: Debug log
debug.description: Debug messages will be included in the log.
debug.sectionDescription: Few additional settings that might be useful.

cachePlaces.title: Cache Places
cachePlaces.description: Cache places location between runs in named KeyVal. Check location in polygon before enqueuing place to requestQueue.
